resources.string: Touch to start the TextJs service
Touch to stop the TextJs service
Start the TextJs service when a Wi-Fi connection is active
Make sure your phone and computer are both connected to Wi-Fi.
Type the address into the address bar on your computer\'s browser.
into the address bar on your computer\'s browser.
Start sending and receiving SMS messages!
TextJs will automatically start when your phone is connected to Wi-Fi.
The address you need to type into your browser is displayed as a notification on your phone.
If you have a tablet, try typing the address into it\'s browser!
